name: Perfectly Balanced (Kévin MOUTTE)
description:
"A monster is destroying our beautiful City, and no one seems to be able to stop him. No one, but TWO ! The only way to beat him is to perfectly execute the ancient technique of your ancestors. Realize the perfect FUS-ION by making the right moves at the SAME TIME to become the greatest warrior of all time. 

This game is for TWO PLAYERS & uses GAMEPADS."

 

CREDITS :
